title: Trudy Harrison – 2022 Comments on Zero Emission HGVs
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Trudy Harrison, the Transport Minister, on 11 May 2022.
content:
Our road freight industry is one of the most efficient in the world and contributes over £13 billion to the UK economy each year.
